name: Decision Dice
about: A dice app to decide a winner on the roll of a dice

name: Drum Kit
about: A drum kit that works by clicking on the drums or by pressing the corresponding key.

name: Simon Game
about: A game where the user has to remember a pattern and repeat it back as it progressively gets more difficult. The game will flash a colour. You must click that colour. On the next level you will get another colour. You must click the first colour and the second colour, and so on...
